document_name: Law of the Republic of Indonesia Number 31 of 2009 concerning Meteorology, Climatology, and Geophysics
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/IDN/2009/IDN-2009-01-01-Law of the Republic of Indonesia Number 31 of 2009 concerning Meteorology, Climatology, and Geophysics_236fb594225f3bcd5247bd7b4c36b07d.pdf
document_description: The law on Meteorology, Climatology and Geophysics establishes the framework of the organisation of meteorology, climatology and geophysics to protect national interests in order to increase security and resilience to climate change.
